nodes.text: The Dark Quarter was a location of Yuw. At some point prior to the Battle of Hoth in 3 ABY, the Sith Lord Darth Vader learned of a plot to assassinate him, and subsequently traveled to the Dark Quarter, where he interrogated and killed several bounty hunters in order to gain information on the organization behind the plot, the Hidden Hand criminal syndicate.

The Dark Quarter appeared in the first issue of the 2019 comic-book series Star Wars: Target Vader, written by Robbie Thompson, illustrated by Marc Laming and Cris Bolson, and released by Marvel Comics on July 3, 2019.
